mapper.select:
SELECT X.rn, X.review_num, X.title, X.content, X.review_date, X.K_NAME, X.L_NUM, X.mem_num, X.mem_nickname, X.ratingAvg FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.review_num, A.title, A.content, A.review_date, A.K_NAME, A.L_NUM, A.mem_num, A.mem_nickname, A.ratingAvg FROM ( SELECT r.review_num, r.title, r.content, r.review_date, l.K_NAME, l.L_NUM, m.mem_num, m.mem_nickname, (SELECT AVG(rt.rating) FROM rating rt WHERE rt.review_num = r.review_num) AS ratingAvg FROM review r JOIN local l ON r.L_NUM = l.L_NUM JOIN member m ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num
AND l.L_NUM = #{area}
AND title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND mem_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY review_num DESC
ORDER BY ratingAvg DESC NULLS LAST , review_num DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= ( ${(pageNum -1) * pageRowCount} + ${pageRowCount} ) ) X WHERE X.rn >= ( ${(pageNum -1) * pageRowCount} +1 )

select count(*) from(SELECT r.review_num, r.title, r.content, m.mem_num, m.mem_nickname FROM review r join member m on r.mem_num = m.mem_num)
AND title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND mem_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_num, mem_num, L_NUM, title, content) values (review_seq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{lnum}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select review_num, title,content, review_date, readcount,edit_date, L_NUM, K_NAME, mem_num, mem_nickname, picture_url,next,prev from ( select r.review_num, r.title,r.content, r.review_date, r.readcount,r.edit_date, l.L_NUM, l.K_NAME, m.mem_num, m.mem_nickname, m.picture_url, lag(review_num,1,-1) over(order by review_num asc) as prev, lead(review_num,1,-1) over(order by review_num asc) as next from review r join local l on r.L_NUM = l.L_NUM join member m on r.mem_num = m.mem_num) where review_num = #{review_num}
select r.review_num, r.title, r.content, r.review_date, l.K_NAME, l.L_NUM from review r join local l on r.L_NUM = l.L_NUM where review_num = #{review_num}
mapper.update: update review set L_NUM = #{lnum}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, edit_date = sysdate where review_num = #{review_num}
mapper.select: SELECT rn, review_num, title, content, review_date, K_NAME, L_NUM, mem_num, mem_nickname, ratingAvg FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ratingAvg DESC NULLS LAST) AS rn, review_num, title, content, review_date, K_NAME, L_NUM, mem_num, mem_nickname, ratingAvg FROM ( SELECT r.review_num, r.title, r.content, r.review_date, l.K_NAME, l.L_NUM, m.mem_num, m.mem_nickname, (SELECT AVG(rt.rating) FROM rating rt WHERE rt.review_num = r.review_num) AS ratingAvg FROM review r JOIN local l ON r.L_NUM = l.L_NUM JOIN member m ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num ) ) WHERE rn <= 9
